title: IS there a link for solo registration?
body: is there a solo registration link, i only found the team registration and it does not let me get pass, or one for looking for teams

replies.body:
Hey NightTemplar,

You need to be a team all from the same university to register.
If you're looking for players to form a team I highly suggest getting out to Uni and asking around (maybe your uni has a LoL club!)
